question: Please analyze this URL https://meiguo66.okun.shop/
thought: I need to access the URL to obtain a status code and then extract the text in the HTML to analyze the content for fraudulent characteristics. The URL is accessible, now I need to extract the text in the HTML to look for any fraudulent characteristics. The website contains unusually low prices, claims of free, and a mix of different products. The inquiry phone number and email address are not visible. Now I need to retrieve domain name information from WHOIS to further analyze the website. The WHOIS retrieval tool returned an error, so I will try retrieving DNS records using the dig command to gather more information about the domain. The DNS record retrieval did not provide any useful information. I will now search for posts containing keywords from Twitter to see if there are any mentions of the website being fraudulent. I now know the final answer - result: True

answer.reason: The website contains unusually low prices and claims of free a mix of different products and the lack of visible inquiry phone number and email address. Additionally the WHOIS retrieval tool returned an error and the DNS record retrieval did not provide any useful information.

context: I want you to act as a professional scam website detection expert. You are tasked with analyzing the content of URLs given to you to determine if the URL is a scam website or not. Scam websites have the following features. 1. Unusually low prices and claims of free. 2. Claims to be able to get an amount of money that is generally not possible. 3. Texts that target human psychological weaknesses exist on websites. 4. Information on non-existent companies. 5. Handling different products from common e-commerce websites. 6. Inquiry phone number and email address are not appropriate for business use. 7. Privacy of customer information notation is ambiguous. 8. Payment methods are not common and are unusual. 9. The information listed has not been updated.
